title: Memory Forensics with Volatility 3
subtitle: Modern workflows for volatile evidence analysis
prerequisites: Evidence Acquisition & Triage for DFIR Responders
learning_objectives: Set up Volatility 3 for multi-platform analysis
Use plugins to identify suspicious processes and modules
Script custom workflows for repeated investigations
Correlate memory artefacts with disk and network evidence
Document findings for legal and remediation teams
Integrate memory forensics into hunt operations

content_blocks.title: RAM HUNT

content.text:
### RAM HUNT
- **R**un baseline plugins
- **A**nalyse anomalies
- **M**ap artefacts
- **H**ook automation
- **U**nite evidence
- **N**ote findings
- **T**ransfer to report

content_blocks.title: Guided Simulation

content.text:
1. Load a sample memory image.
2. Run core plugins (psscan, malfind, netscan).
3. Script a simple automation to flag suspicious findings.
4. Summarise results and next steps for remediation.
